name: Peach-n-Love
description:
Just another dumb lil game with smol food items.

HOW TO PLAY:
Talk to characters, collect coloured balls and build relationships!
Can you win the love of another in 60 seconds? 

Controls:

  •  Arrow keys to move
    • Shift + arrow keys to run
  • Space bar to speak to someone 
    • Press space again to skip text

**NOTE** If you reach an ending, press [ ENTER ]  to return to menu! (Mistake of accidentally leaving that out on my part)

Current Features:

  • 4 Characters to interact with
  • Changes in dialogue (if you earn enough love exp.)
  • 4 Good ends 
  • 5 Bad ends

Will possibly update with better art, more graphics, characters and bug fixes in the future! 

Enjoy! 

* All art made in Aseprite. I apologize for the badly drawn endings -- was pressed for time. *  

Made within 72 hours for pre-indie game jam.

credits:
text sounds -- the friendly cosmonaut
dialogue ui -- my own work*
